text: BACKGROUND Since the introduction of the first cholinesterase inhibitor ChEI in 1997 most clinicians and probably most patients would consider the cholinergic drugs donepezil galantamine and rivastigmine to be the first line pharmacotherapy for mild to moderate Alzheimers diseaseThe drugs have slightly different pharmacological properties but they all work by inhibiting the breakdown of acetylcholine an important neurotransmitter associated with memory by blocking the enzyme acetylcholinesterase
original: BACKGROUND Since the introduction of the first cholinesterase inhibitor ChEI in 1997 most clinicians and probably most patients would consider the cholinergic drugs donepezil galantamine and rivastigmine to be the first line pharmacotherapy for mild to moderate Alzheimers diseaseThe drugs have slightly different pharmacological properties but they all work by inhibiting the breakdown of acetylcholine an important neurotransmitter associated with memory by blocking the enzyme acetylcholinesterase
simplified: Since the introduction of the first cholinesterase inhibitor ChEI in 1997 most clinicians and probably most patients would consider the cholinergic drugs donepezil galantamine and rivastigmine to be the first line pharmacotherapy for mild to moderate Alzheimers disease; however, there is still some disagreement over whether donepezil and rivastigmine are better for people with mild to moderate Alzheimers disease.

original: These results suggest that the megabase DNA fragmentation is induced as a consequence of inhibition of thymidylate synthase by Tomudex and kilobase DNA fragmentation may correlate with the reduction of p27kip1 expression and the increase in cyclin E and cdk2 kinase activities

original: SIRT1 coprecipitated with PPARα and nicotinamide increased the acetylation of the PPARα coactivator PGC1α which was suppressed by resveratrol

original: Inhibition of SIRT1 significantly increased vascular superoxide production enhanced NADPH oxidase activity and mRNA expression of its subunits p22phox and NOX4 which were prevented by resveratrol

original: Exposure of cells to 4mM NaF for 24h induced caspase3 activation ultrastructural alterations and resulted in the translocation of Bax to the mitochondria and the release of cytochrome c from the mitochondrial intermembrane space into the cytosol indicating that fluoridemediated apoptosis is mitochondriadependent

text: Given that FRD present in all H pylori strains is immunogenic in H pylori infected patients and H pylori growth in vitro can be inhibited by three anthelmintics morantel oxantel and thiabendazole this enzyme could potentially be used both as a novel drug target as well as in the development of vaccines for H pylori prevention and eradication
original: Given that FRD present in all H pylori strains is immunogenic in H pylori infected patients and H pylori growth in vitro can be inhibited by three anthelmintics morantel oxantel and thiabendazole this enzyme could potentially be used both as a novel drug target as well as in the development of vaccines for H pylori prevention and eradication

This enzyme could be used both as a novel drug target as well as in the development of vaccines for H pylori prevention and eradication, because it can be found in all H pylori strains.

simplified: Using cultured human keratinocytes and diabetic rat model the current study showed that high glucose environment enhanced IL8 production in keratinocytes by a reactive oxygen species ROSdependent manner in a high glucose environment.

text: High glucose environment increased interleukin8 secretion and increased oxidative stress New insights on diabetic wound healing .
original: High glucose environment enhanced oxidative stress and increased interleukin8 secretion from keratinocytes New insights on impaired diabetic wound healing
simplified: High glucose environment increased interleukin8 secretion and increased oxidative stress New insights on diabetic wound healing.

original: With the elevated doses of PhIP malondialdehyde MDA contents protein carbonyl PCO contents and DNAprotein crosslinks DPC coefficients were significantly raised in a dosedependent manner 3 PhIP at the doses of 10mgkg andor 15mgkg significantly inhibited p16 mRNA and protein expression whereas enhanced cfos and cjun expression relative to control

original: These results suggest that prostacyclin may play a role in downregulating tissue factor expression in monocytes at least in part via elevation of intracellular levels of cyclic AMP

simplified: The present studies were undertaken to determine whether stable analogues of prostacyclin could inhibit tissue factor expression by human monocytic cells by a potent endotheliumderived platelet inhibitor.

original: Preincubation for 30 minutes with iloprost ciprostene and carbacyclin led to a dosedependent inhibition of tissue factor expression induced by all three challenging agents

simplified: Prostacyclin and its analogues inhibit the expression of tissue factors in the human monocytic cell line THP1.

text: This effect was potentiated by isobutylmethylxanthine an inhibitor of phosphodiesterase
original: This effect was potentiated by isobutylmethylxanthine an inhibitor of phosphodiesterase
simplified: This effect is increased by isobutylmethylxanthine when it is in the blood.

original: The inhibitory effects of iloprost on tissue factor expression were also potentiated by isobutylmethylxanthine and mimicked by forskolin and d ibutyryl cyclic AMP but not dibutyryl cyclic GMP
simplified: The inhibitory effects of iloprost on tissue factor expression were also potentiated by isobutylmethylxanthine. Forskolin and dibutyryl cyclic GMP were also able to inhibit iloprost.

text: 5FU interferes with DNA synthesis by blocking thymidylate synthase TS . Dihydropyrimidine dehydrogenase ( DPD ) removes the 5FU .
original: 5FU interferes with DNA synthesis by blocking thymidylate synthase TS but is inactivated by dihydropyrimidine dehydrogenase DPD
simplified: 5FU interferes with DNA synthesis by blocking thymidylate synthase TS. Dihydropyrimidine dehydrogenase (DPD) removes the 5FU.

original: PURPOSE The fluoropyrimidine carbamate capecitabine is converted to 5fluorouracil 5FU by thymidine phosphorylase TP inside target tissues
simplified: The fluoropyrimidine carbamate capecitabine is changed into 5fluorouracil by thymidine phosphorylase inside the body.

simplified: Favorable enzyme profiles high TP and low DPD produce high intratumor levels of 5FU. This helps the treatment of many types of cancer.

text: Histamine and Ca added to NSAIDs made CA II more active because of this .

text: Indomethacin abolished the inhibitory effect of acetazolamide on CA I and CA II
original: Indomethacin abolished the inhibitory effect of acetazolamide on CA I and CA II
simplified: Indomethacin completely removed the acetazolamide inhibitory effect.

original: Association of PGE2 or acetazolamide to NSAIDs reduced NSAIDinduced activation of CA I and CA II
simplified: The relationship between PGE2 and NSAIDs has been shown to reduce CA I and CA II activation.

original: CONCLUSIONS In the maximum registered dosage nabumetone inhibits thromboxane production much more than meloxicam signifying less COX2 selectivity of the former
simplified: In the maximum registered dosage, nabumetone inhibits thromboxane production much more than meloxicam. This means that the former is less effective.

original: COX1 inhibition was measured as percentage inhibition of serum TXB2 generation in clotting whole blood and as closure time with use of the platelet function analyser PFA100

original: Treatment with diclofenac resulted in nuclear condensation a morphological change due to apoptosis of NSCs 24hr after the treatment and activated caspase3 after 6 hr indicating that diclofenac may cause apoptosis of neuronal cells via activation of the caspase cascade
simplified: Treatment with diclofenac caused a morphological change in NSCs 24 hours after the treatment and activated caspase3 after 6 hours. This means that diclofenac may cause apoptosis of neuronal cells because it starts the caspase cascade.

original: Correlation between activation of PPARγ and resistin downregulation in a mouse adipocyte cell line by a series of thiazolidinediones
simplified: The relationship between resistin downregulation and PPARγ activation in a mouse adipocyte cell line was found.

text: Firstly in the normal human renal epithelial HK2 cells the measurement of the expression of 30 previously reported NRF2 target genes in response to NRF2 inducers sulforaphane tertbutylhydroquinone cinnamic aldehyde and hydrogen peroxide showed that the aldoketo reductase AKR 1C1 is highly inducible by all treatments

simplified: When U937 cells were treated with sulforaphane, NRF2 inducers, the expression of AKR1B1 1B10 1C1 1C2 and 1C3 increased.

original: Whereas the levels of both the basal and sulforaphane inducible expression of AKR1C1 were significantly reduced in NRF2silenced stable U937 cells compared to the control cells

original: Endothelial NO synthase expression was increased by cilazapril but not by losartan
simplified: Endothelial NO synthase activity was increased by losartan but not by cilazapril

original: OMT showed partial protection in the cortical neurons via downregulation of NR2B containing NMDA receptors and upregulation of Bcl2 family

original: Western blot analysis revealed that OMT decreased the expression of Bax and repaired the balance of pro and antiapoptotic proteins

original: Furthermore OMT significantly reversed the upregulation of NR2B and inhibited the calcium overload in the cultured neurons after challenging the NMDA

original: Emodin6OβDglucoside inhibits HMGB1 induced inflammatory responses in vitro and in vivo
simplified: Emodin6OβDglucoside inhibits the transcription of the HMGB1 gene in vitro.

text: Ramelteon Rozerem Takeda Pharmaceutical Company Limited Osaka Japan is an orally active highly selective melatonin MT1 MT2 receptor agonist
original: Ramelteon Rozerem Takeda Pharmaceutical Company Limited Osaka Japan is an orally active highly selective melatonin MT1 MT2 receptor agonist
simplified: Ramelteon (Rozerem) is a drug made by Takeda Pharmaceutical Company Limited. It is used to treat melatonin deficiency.

text: Unlike other hypnotics that target GABAA receptor complexes , ramelteon acts on the melatonin MT1 and MT2 receptors . These receptors are located in the suprachiasmatic nucleus of the central nervous system .
original: Unlike the sedative hypnotics that target GABAA receptor complexes ramelteon is a chronohypnotic that acts on the melatonin MT1 and MT2 receptors which are primarily located in the suprachiasmatic nucleus the bodys master clock
simplified: Unlike other hypnotics that target GABAA receptor complexes, ramelteon acts on the melatonin MT1 and MT2 receptors. These receptors are located in the suprachiasmatic nucleus of the central nervous system.

original: Pharmacology of ramelteon a selective MT1 MT2 receptor agonist a novel therapeutic drug for sleep disorders
simplified: Ramelteon a novel therapeutic drug for sleep disorders that acts on the MT1 and MT2 receptors

text: Am80 inhibited VEGF induced phosphorylation of VEGF receptor
original: Am80 inhibited VEGF induced phosphorylation of VEGF receptor
simplified: Am80 did not allow VEGF to be phosphorylated.

original: In addition VEGF induced formation of tubelike structures in vitro and neovascularization in mouse corneas were significantly inhibited by Am80
simplified: In addition, in vitro formation of tubelike structures and neovascularization in mouse corneas were significantly inhibited by Am80.

original: Am80 slightly inhibited the growth of both myeloma cells and HUVECs and remarkably inhibited the growth of HUVECs stimulated by VEGF
simplified: Am80 slightly inhibited the growth of both myeloma cells and HUVECs. It was also able to inhibit the growth of HUVECs.

text: We have examined the effect of dihydropyridine Ca2channel blockers felodipine and nicardipine on CaMPDE
original: We have examined the effect of dihydropyridine Ca2channel blockers felodipine and nicardipine on CaMPDE
simplified: The effect of dihydropyridine and nicardipine on CaMPDE has been examined in humans.

text: The results suggest that the 63kDa PDE 1B1 and 60kDa PDE 1A2 CaMPDE isozymes are inhibited by felodipine and nicardipine . The inhibitory effect of nicardipine on felodipine is not clear .
original: The results suggest that the 63kDa PDE 1B1 and 60kDa PDE 1A2 CaMPDE isozymes are inhibited by felodipine and nicardipine by partial competitive inhibition and that these two Ca2 antagonists appear to counteract each other
simplified: The results suggest that the 63kDa PDE 1B1 and 60kDa PDE 1A2 CaMPDE isozymes are inhibited by felodipine and nicardipine. The inhibitory effect of nicardipine on felodipine is not clear.

text: Felodipine and nicardipine have similar affinities for 60kDa CaMPDE isozymes but bring about different levels of enzyme inhibition suggesting the possibility of designing specific drugs that can protect the enzyme from inhibition by dihydropyridine Ca2channel blockers
original: Felodipine and nicardipine have similar affinities for 60kDa CaMPDE isozymes but bring about different levels of enzyme inhibition suggesting the possibility of designing specific drugs that can protect the enzyme from inhibition by dihydropyridine Ca2channel blockers
simplified: Felodipine and nicardipine have similar chemical similarity for 60kDa CaMPDE isozymes but they cause different levels of enzyme inhibition. This means that it may be possible to design drugs that can protect the enzyme.

text: Several inhibitors of LpPLA2 have been described . One of these is called darapladib , which is currently in clinical development .
original: Several inhibitors of LpPLA2 have been described including darapladib which is currently in phase 3 clinical development for the treatment of atherosclerosis
simplified: Several inhibitors of LpPLA2 have been described. One of these is called darapladib, which is currently in clinical development.

text: We show that both darapladib and a novel class of carbamate inhibitors inactivate LpPLA2 in human and mouse cells with high selectivity .
original: We show that both darapladib and a novel class of structurally distinct carbamate inhibitors inactivate LpPLA2 in mouse tissues and human cell lines with high selectivity
simplified: We show that both darapladib and a novel class of carbamate inhibitors inactivate LpPLA2 in human and mouse cells with high selectivity.

text: Sepracor in the US is developing arformoterol RRformoterol a single isomer form of the beta2adrenoceptor agonist formoterol eformoterol
original: Sepracor in the US is developing arformoterol RRformoterol a single isomer form of the beta2adrenoceptor agonist formoterol eformoterol
simplified: Sepracor in the US is developing a single isomer form of formoterol (acetaminophen) called arformoterol (acetaminophen).

original: Nitric oxide products of VP16 displayed significantly diminished topoisomerase II dependent cleavage of DNA and cytotoxicity to human HL60 leukemia cells
simplified: Nitric oxide products of VP16 showed significantly less DNA damage when they were put into human leukemia cells.

text: Refeeding normal chow or a high sucrose diet for 24 h after a 48h fast increased both the expression of ACS1 and ACS4 by 1520fold .
original: Refeeding normal chow or a high sucrose diet for 24 h after a 48h fast increased both ACS1 and ACS4 protein expression 1520fold consistent with inhibition studies
simplified: Refeeding normal chow or a high sucrose diet for 24 h after a 48h fast increased both the expression of ACS1 and ACS4 by 1520fold.

text: Consistent with these locations Nethylmaleimide an inhibitor of ACS4 inhibited ACS activity 47 in MAM and 28 in endoplasmic reticulum
original: Consistent with these locations Nethylmaleimide an inhibitor of ACS4 inhibited ACS activity 47 in MAM and 28 in endoplasmic reticulum
simplified: Nethylmaleimide, an inhibitor of ACS4, inhibited MAM activity by 47% and endoplasmic reticulum activity by 28%.

text: Troglitazone a second ACS4 inhibitor inhibited ACS activity 10 in microsomes and mitochondria and 45 in MAM
original: Troglitazone a second ACS4 inhibitor inhibited ACS activity 10 in microsomes and mitochondria and 45 in MAM
simplified: Troglitazone, a second ACS4 inhibitor, also did not work. It only worked in microsomes and mitochondria.

text: Triacsin C a competitive inhibitor of both ACS1 and ACS4 inhibited ACS activity in endoplasmic reticulum MAM and mitochondria . This suggests that triacsinsensitive ACS is present in mitochondria .
original: Triacsin C a competitive inhibitor of both ACS1 and ACS4 inhibited ACS activity similarly in endoplasmic reticulum MAM and mitochondria suggesting that a hitherto unidentified triacsinsensitive ACS is present in mitochondria
simplified: Triacsin C a competitive inhibitor of both ACS1 and ACS4 inhibited ACS activity in endoplasmic reticulum MAM and mitochondria. This suggests that triacsinsensitive ACS is present in mitochondria.

text: These results suggest that ACS1 and ACS4 may be linked to triacylglycerol synthesis
original: These results suggest that ACS1 and ACS4 may be linked to triacylglycerol synthesis
simplified: These results suggest that triacylglycerol synthesis may be involved.

text: ZD1839 Iressa a quinazoline t tyrosine kinase inhibitor selective for the EGFR has shown good activity in preclinical studies and in the early phase of clinical trials
original: ZD1839 Iressa a quinazoline t tyrosine kinase inhibitor selective for the EGFR has shown good activity in preclinical studies and in the early phase of clinical trials
simplified: ZD1839 Iressa a quinazoline t tyrosine kinase inhibitor has shown good activity in preclinical studies, but has not yet been approved for use in patients.

text: The tyrosine kinase inhibitor ZD1839 Iressa inhibits HER2 driven signaling and suppresses the growth of HER2 overexpressing tumor cells
original: The tyrosine kinase inhibitor ZD1839 Iressa inhibits HER2 driven signaling and suppresses the growth of HER2 overexpressing tumor cells
simplified: The tyrosine kinase inhibitor ZD1839 Iressa inhibits the growth of tumor cells by causing a reduction in tyrosine.

text: These studies suggest that HER2overexpressing tumors are particularly susceptible to the inhibition of tyrosine kinase signaling , and suggest novel ways to treat them .
original: These studies suggest that HER2overexpressing tumors are particularly susceptible to the inhibition of HER family tyrosine kinase signaling and suggest novel strategies to treat these particularly aggressive tumors
simplified: These studies suggest that HER2overexpressing tumors are particularly susceptible to the inhibition of tyrosine kinase signaling, and suggest novel ways to treat them.

text: Growth inhibition of these tumor cell lines was associated with the loss of association of HER3 with phosphatidylinositol 3kinase and downregulation of Akt activity .
original: Growth inhibition of these tumor cell lines was associated with the dephosphorylation of EGFR HER2 and HER3 accompanied by the loss of association of HER3 with phosphatidylinositol 3kinase and downregulation of Akt activity
simplified: Growth inhibition of these tumor cell lines was associated with the loss of association of HER3 with phosphatidylinositol 3kinase and downregulation of Akt activity.

text: The drug naltrexone works by attacking the muopioid receptor in the brain .
original: Pharmacological effects of a muopioid receptor antagonist naltrexone on alcohol dependence
simplified: The drug naltrexone works by attacking the muopioid receptor in the brain.

text: In many countries a muopioid receptor antagonist naltrexone has been used in the treatment of alcohol dependence
original: In many countries a muopioid receptor antagonist naltrexone has been used in the treatment of alcohol dependence
simplified: Naltrexone is a muopioid receptor antagonist. It is used to treat alcohol dependence.

text: Lisuride dose dependently decreased body temperature in rats with a potency similar to that of the selective 5HT1A agonist LY 293284
original: Lisuride dose dependently decreased body temperature in rats with a potency similar to that of the selective 5HT1A agonist LY 293284
simplified: Lisuride dose helped reduce body temperature in rats. The effect was similar to that of the drug naltrexone (LY 293284).

text: RESULTS In drug discrimination studies lisuride fully mimicked the 5HT1A agonist LY 293284 only partially substituted for LSD and DOI and failed to substitute for amphetamine
original: RESULTS In drug discrimination studies lisuride fully mimicked the 5HT1A agonist LY 293284 only partially substituted for LSD and DOI and failed to substitute for amphetamine
simplified: Results In drug discrimination studies, lisuride was more effective than LSD and DOI when compared to 5HT1A. However, it was not as effective as amphetamine.

text: Only pMPPI 4iodoN24methoxyphenyl1piperazinylethylN2pyridynylbenzamide hydrochloride a selective 5HT1A antagonist was effective in inhibiting all 5HT syndrome behaviors produced by lisuride whereas pMPPI was without effect on any behavior induced by LSD
original: Only pMPPI 4iodoN24methoxyphenyl1piperazinylethylN2pyridynylbenzamide hydrochloride a selective 5HT1A antagonist was effective in inhibiting all 5HT syndrome behaviors produced by lisuride whereas pMPPI was without effect on any behavior induced by LSD
simplified: Only pMPPI 4iodoN24methoxyphenyl1piperazinylethylN2pyridynylbenzamide hydrochloride was effective in inhibiting all 5HT syndrome behaviors. However, pMPPI had no effect on any behavior that was caused by LSD.

text: Thus bupropion acts as an antagonist at alpha3beta2 and alpha3beta4 nAChRs in the rat striatum and hippocampus . DAT and NET function are affected by bupropion .
original: Thus bupropion acts as an antagonist at alpha3beta2 and alpha3beta4 nAChRs in rat striatum and hippocampus respectively across the same concentration range that inhibits DAT and NET function
simplified: Thus bupropion acts as an antagonist at alpha3beta2 and alpha3beta4 nAChRs in the rat striatum and hippocampus. DAT and NET function are affected by bupropion.

text: The combination of nAChR and transporter inhibition produced by bupropion may help people stop smoking . This is called smoking cessation .
original: The combination of nAChR and transporter inhibition produced by bupropion may contribute to its clinical efficacy as a smoking cessation agent
simplified: The combination of nAChR and transporter inhibition produced by bupropion may help people stop smoking. This is called smoking cessation.

text: Bupropion an efficacious antidepressant and smoking cessation agent inhibits dopamine and norepinephrine transporters DAT and NET respectively
original: Bupropion an efficacious antidepressant and smoking cessation agent inhibits dopamine and norepinephrine transporters DAT and NET respectively
simplified: Bupropion is an effective smoking cessation and antidepressant agent. It inhibits the dopamine and norepinephrine transporters.

text: To remove the interaction of bupropion with DAT or NET nomifensine and desipramine were added to the solution .
original: To eliminate the interaction of bupropion with DAT or NET nomifensine or desipramine respectively was included in the superfusion buffer
simplified: To remove the interaction of bupropion with DAT or NET nomifensine and desipramine were added to the solution.

original: Furthermore N BPs decreased the levels of phosphorylated extracellular signalregulated kinase ERK and mTOR via suppression of Ras prenylation and enhanced Bim expression

original: The present results indicated that N BPs induce apoptosis by decreasing the mitochondrial transmembrane potential increasing the activation of caspase9 and caspase3 and enhancing Bim expression through inhibition of the Ras MEK ERK and Ras mTOR pathways
simplified: The present results indicated that N BPs induce apoptosis by decreasing the mitochondrial transmembrane potential and enhancing Bim expression through inhibition of the Ras MEK ERK and Ras mTOR pathways.

text: Nitrogen containing bisphosphonates induce apoptosis of hematopoietic tumor cells via inhibition of Ras signaling pathways and Bim mediated activation of the intrinsic apoptotic pathway
original: Nitrogen containing bisphosphonates induce apoptosis of hematopoietic tumor cells via inhibition of Ras signaling pathways and Bim mediated activation of the intrinsic apoptotic pathway
simplified: Nitrogen containing bisphosphonates induce apoptosis of hematopoietic tumor cells. Bim mediated activation of the intrinsic apoptotic pathway is involved in this process.

text: Nitrogen containing bisphosphonates N BPs induce apoptosis in tumor cells by inhibiting the prenylation of small Gproteins
original: Nitrogen containing bisphosphonates N BPs induce apoptosis in tumor cells by inhibiting the prenylation of small Gproteins
simplified: Bisphosphonates (N BPs) cause apoptosis (cell death) in tumor cells. They stop small proteins from being made.

text: When the levels of P2X3 were reduced , the proteasomal inhibitor MG132 worked .
original: The reduction of P2X3 expression levels was reversed by the proteasomal inhibitor MG132

original: We investigated the involvement of the farnesoid X receptor FXR a nuclear receptor for bile acids in the chenodeoxycholic acid CDCA induced expression of Cdx2 and MUC2 in normal rat gastric epithelial cells RGM1 cells

simplified: CDCA changed the expression of MUC2 and Cdx2 at both the mRNA and protein levels.

original: The maximum stimulation of Cdx2 and MUC2 mRNA induced by CDCA was observed at 3 h and by 6 h respectively
simplified: The maximum level of CDCA stimulation of Cdx2 and MUC2 mRNA was observed at 3 h and by 6 h.

text: The effects of CDCA and GW4064 on expression of Cdx2 and MUC2 were abolished by guggulsterone
original: The effects of CDCA and GW4064 on expression of Cdx2 and MUC2 were abolished by guggulsterone
simplified: The effects of CDCA and GW4064 on MUC2 were abolished by guggulsterone in 2004.

text: RGM1 cells were treated with either CDCA or GW4064 , an FXR agonist , or guggulsterone , an FXR antagonist .
original: RGM1 cells were treated with CDCA or GW4064 an FXR agonist in the presence or absence of guggulsterone an FXR antagonist
simplified: RGM1 cells were treated with either CDCA or GW4064, an FXR agonist, or guggulsterone, an FXR antagonist.

text: While there is a lot of indirect evidence that histamine is involved in asthma , it has been difficult to evaluate H1receptor antagonism in this condition because many of the early H1receptor antagonists did more than just stop histamine from working . original: An increase in the ADP ATP ratio opens KATP channels leading to membrane hyperpolarization
simplified: When there is more ADP, KATP channels open. This causes membrane hyperpolarization.

text: OBJECTIVE This randomized doubleblind study tested the hypothesis that rofecoxib a drug that specifically inhibits cyclooxygenase 2 would cause fewer gastroduodenal ulcers than ibuprofen in a multicenter trial and its side effects would be equivalent to those of placebo in a prespecified analysis combining the results with another trial of identical design
original: OBJECTIVE This randomized doubleblind study tested the hypothesis that rofecoxib a drug that specifically inhibits cyclooxygenase 2 would cause fewer gastroduodenal ulcers than ibuprofen in a multicenter trial and its side effects would be equivalent to those of placebo in a prespecified analysis combining the results with another trial of identical design
simplified: OBJECTIVE This randomized doubleblind study tested the hypothesis that rofecoxib would cause fewer gastroduodenal ulcers than ibuprofen in a multicenter trial and its side effects would be equivalent to those of placebo in a prespecified analysis combining the results with another trial of identical design.

simplified: Huperzine A Hup A is a naturally occurring drug. It is a powerful AChE inhibitor in the blood.

original: The synthetic stereoisomer Hup A is less toxic due to poor AChE inhibition and is suitable for both prepostexposure treatments of nerve agent toxicity
simplified: The synthetic stereoisomer Hup A is less toxic due to poor AChE inhibition. It can be used to treat nerve agent toxicity as well.

original: Of the PDE inhibitors tested dipyridamole was most effective with IC50 values of 12 and 045 microM for inhibition of cAMP and cGMP hydrolysis respectively
simplified: Dipyridamole was most effective with IC50 values of 12 and 045 microM for cAMP and cGMP hydrolysis. The IC50 value was 12.

original: Cloning and characterization of a novel human phosphodiesterase that hydrolyzes both cAMP and cGMP PDE10A

simplified: Weekly subcutaneous decitabine increases HbF and total hemoglobin. This is done through a non-cytotoxic way.

original: We examined if subcutaneous decitabine could increase HbF levels and improve SSD pathophysiology without cytotoxicity
simplified: We examined if subcutaneous decitabine could improve SSD pathophysiology without cytotoxic effects.

original: The cytosine analog 5aza2deoxycytidine decitabine hypomethylates DNA by inhibiting DNA methyltransferase
simplified: The cytosine analog 5aza2deoxycytidine decitabine acts on the DNA to make it shorter.

text: Such model of Nox4 activity regulation could provide new insight into the molecular mechanism of electron transfer through the enzyme and could also define new therapeutic targets in diseases in which quinones and Nox4 are involved .
original: Such model of Nox4 activity regulation could provide new insight into the understanding of the molecular mechanism of the electron transfer through the enzyme ie its potential redox regulation and could also define new therapeutic targets in diseases in which quinones and Nox4 are implicated
simplified: Such model of Nox4 activity regulation could provide new insight into the molecular mechanism of electron transfer through the enzyme and could also define new therapeutic targets in diseases in which quinones and Nox4 are involved.

text: Nox4 oxidase activity is thought to be controlled at the transcriptional level . However , we challenge this point of view and suggest that specific quinone derivatives could influence this activity .
original: Nox4 oxidase activity is thought to be constitutive and regulated at the transcriptional level however we challenge this point of view and suggest that specific quinone derivatives could modulate this activity
simplified: Nox4 oxidase activity is thought to be controlled at the transcriptional level. However, we challenge this point of view and suggest that specific quinone derivatives could influence this activity.

text: In fact , 4 quinone derivatives ( AA861 tBuBHQ tBuBQ and duroquinone ) were found to stimulate Nox4 activity in 3 different cellular models , including chondrocyte cell lines .
original: In fact we demonstrated a significant stimulation of Nox4 activity by 4 quinone derivatives AA861 tBuBHQ tBuBQ and duroquinone observed in 3 different cellular models HEK293E TREx™ and chondrocyte cell lines
simplified: In fact, 4 quinone derivatives (AA861 tBuBHQ tBuBQ and duroquinone) were found to stimulate Nox4 activity in 3 different cellular models, including chondrocyte cell lines.

text: In a recent study , antiacetyl lysine antibodies and immunological methods were used to show that aspirin can acetylate the tumor suppressor protein p53 .
original: In a recent study using proteinspecific antiacetyl lysine antibodies and immunological methods we demonstrated the ability of aspirin to acetylate the tumor suppressor protein p53
simplified: In a recent study, antiacetyl lysine antibodies and immunological methods were used to show that aspirin can acetylate the tumor suppressor protein p53.

text: Although the mechanism by which aspirin inhibits cyclooxygenases has been well studied , some of its adverse effects as well as its antiinflammatoryanalgesic properties have not been well studied .
original: Although the inhibition of cyclooxygenases by aspirin which leads to its antiinflammatoryanalgesic properties has been well studied the mechanisms involved in its chemopreventive effects as well as some of its adverse effects are as yet illdefined
simplified: Although the mechanism by which aspirin inhibits cyclooxygenases has been well studied, some of its adverse effects as well as its antiinflammatoryanalgesic properties have not been well studied.

text: All in all , our findings support a model in which Top2β promotes CPT induced apoptosis in quiescent cells , possibly due to p53 accumulation and RNAP LS depletion .
original: Altogether our findings support a model in which Top2β deficiency promotes CPT induced apoptosis in quiescent nonSphase cells possibly due to RNAP LS depletion and p53 accumulation
simplified: All in all, our findings support a model in which Top2β promotes CPT induced apoptosis in quiescent cells, possibly due to p53 accumulation and RNAP LS depletion.

text: To explore the molecular basis for CPT hypersensitivity in Top2βdeficient cells we found that upon CPT exposure the RNA polymerase II large subunit RNAP LS became progressively depleted while in wildtype MEFs it recovered to nearly the original level but in Top2βdeficient cells it remained depleted .
original: To explore the molecular basis for CPT hypersensitivity in Top2βdeficient cells we found that upon CPT exposure the RNA polymerase II large subunit RNAP LS became progressively depleted followed by recovery to nearly the original level in wildtype MEFs whereas RNAP LS remained depleted without recovery in Top2βdeficient cells
simplified: To explore the molecular basis for CPT hypersensitivity in Top2βdeficient cells we found that upon CPT exposure the RNA polymerase II large subunit RNAP LS became progressively depleted while in wildtype MEFs it recovered to nearly the original level but in Top2βdeficient cells it remained depleted.

text: Felodipine and the pchloro analogue inhibited the actinactivated Mg2ATPase activity of smooth muscle myosin IC50 = 251 microM
original: Felodipine and the pchloro analogue inhibited the actinactivated Mg2ATPase activity of smooth muscle myosin IC50 = 251 microM
simplified: Felodipine and the pchloro analogue inhibited the action of Mg2ATPase in smooth muscle tissues.

text: Similarly felodipine and the pchloro analogue blocked the assembly of myosin filament when calmodulin was low . The oxidized and tbutyl analogues did not .
original: Similarly felodipine and the pchloro analogue blocked myosin filament assembly induced by low concentrations of calmodulin whereas the oxidized and tbutyl analogues did not
simplified: Similarly felodipine and the pchloro analogue blocked the assembly of myosin filament when calmodulin was low. The oxidized and tbutyl analogues did not.

text: We have examined the effects on the activities of three enzymes : cAMP phosphodiesterase , caldesmon kinase and myosin light chain kinase . We have also examined the effects of three analogues : pchloro oxidized , tbutyl and dihydropyridine Ca2 channel blocker felodipine .
original: We have examined the effects on the activities of three calmodulindependent enzymes cAMP phosphodiesterase caldesmon kinase and myosin light chain kinase of the dihydropyridine Ca2 channel blocker felodipine and three analogues pchloro oxidized and tbutyl exhibiting different pharmacological potencies
simplified: We have examined the effects on the activities of three enzymes: cAMP phosphodiesterase, caldesmon kinase and myosin light chain kinase. We have also examined the effects of three analogues: pchloro oxidized, tbutyl and dihydropyridine Ca2 channel blocker felodipine.

text: Again inhibition of the actinactivated myosin Mg2ATPase and myosin filament assembly by felodipine and the pchloro analogue could be reversed by raising the calmodulin concentration
original: Again inhibition of the actinactivated myosin Mg2ATPase and myosin filament assembly by felodipine and the pchloro analogue could be reversed by raising the calmodulin concentration
simplified: When felodipine and the pchloro analogue touch myosin, it stops myosin filament assembly. This can be reversed by raising the calmodulin concentration.

text: These observations suggest that some of the pharmacological actions of felodipine on smooth muscle may involve inhibition of calmodulindependent enzymes . These enzymes are important for smooth muscle function .
original: These observations suggest that some of the pharmacological actions of felodipine on smooth muscle may involve inhibition of calmodulindependent enzymes which are functionally involved in the regulation of smooth muscle contraction
simplified: These observations suggest that some of the pharmacological actions of felodipine on smooth muscle may involve inhibition of calmodulindependent enzymes. These enzymes are important for smooth muscle function.

text: The cAMP phosphodiesterase was inhibited completely by felodipine and the pchloro analogue with IC50 values of 37 and 15 microM respectively
original: The cAMP phosphodiesterase was inhibited completely by felodipine and the pchloro analogue with IC50 values of 37 and 15 microM respectively
simplified: The cAMP phosphodiesterase was completely inhibited by felodipine. The IC50 value for felodipine was 15 microM.

text: Felodipine and the pchloro analogue inhibited the activity of cAMP phosphodiesterase by calmodulin and thus the cAMP cycle was stopped .
original: Felodipine and the pchloro analogue inhibited the basal Ca2calmodulinindependent activity of cAMP phosphodiesterase as well as the calmodulin stimulated activity
simplified: Felodipine and the pchloro analogue inhibited the activity of cAMP phosphodiesterase by calmodulin and thus the cAMP cycle was stopped.

text: Calmodulin prevents felodipine and the pchloro analogue from inhibiting cAMP phosphodiesterase .
original: Calmodulin was relatively ineffective in preventing inhibition of cAMP phosphodiesterase by felodipine and the pchloro analogue
simplified: Calmodulin prevents felodipine and the pchloro analogue from inhibiting cAMP phosphodiesterase.

text: Felodipine and the pchloro analogue inhibited Ca2calmodulindependent caldesmon kinase ( IC50 = 174 microM ) but the oxidized and tbutyl analogues had no effect .
original: Felodipine and the pchloro analogue inhibited Ca2calmodulindependent caldesmon kinase with similar potencies IC50 = 174 microM whereas the oxidized and tbutyl analogues caused no inhibition
simplified: Felodipine and the pchloro analogue inhibited Ca2calmodulindependent caldesmon kinase (IC50 = 174 microM) but the oxidized and tbutyl analogues had no effect.

text: Similarly felodipine and the pchloro analogue inhibited myosin light chain kinase activity . The IC50 of the isolated 20 kD light chain was 126 microM , and the IC50 of the intact myosin was 110 microM .
original: Similarly felodipine and the pchloro analogue inhibited myosin light chain kinase activity whether the isolated 20 kD light chain IC50 = 126 microM or intact myosin IC50 = 110 microM was used as substrate
simplified: Similarly felodipine and the pchloro analogue inhibited myosin light chain kinase activity. The IC50 of the isolated 20 kD light chain was 126 microM, and the IC50 of the intact myosin was 110 microM.

original: Effects of felodipine a dihydropyridine calcium channel blocker and analogues on calmodulindependent enzymes
simplified: Felodipine (also known as dihydropyridine) is a chemical compound. It is an enzyme.

original: Aldosterone induced ENaC and basal NaKATPase trafficking via protein kinase D1phosphatidylinositol 4kinaseIIIβ trans Golgi signalling in M1 cortical collecting duct cells

original: Aldosterone also induces the rapid phosphorylation of Protein Kinase D1 PKD1

text: The reason for this is that pindolol acts on the 5HT1A receptor in the brain .
original: This effect has been attributed to the antagonist effects of pindolol at the 5HT1A receptor
simplified: The reason for this is that pindolol acts on the 5HT1A receptor in the brain.

text: In the present study we compared the pharmacology of pindolol WAY100635 a 5HT1A antagonist GR127935 a 5HT1B1D antagonist and isamoltane a 5HT1B antagonist when given acutely in combination with fluoxetine using in vivo microdialysis in the frontal cortex of the freely moving rat
original: In the present study we compared the pharmacology of pindolol WAY100635 a 5HT1A antagonist GR127935 a 5HT1B1D antagonist and isamoltane a 5HT1B antagonist when given acutely in combination with fluoxetine using in vivo microdialysis in the frontal cortex of the freely moving rat
simplified: In the present study we compared the pharmacology of pindolol and isamoltane when given acutely in combination with fluoxetine in the frontal cortex of the freely moving rat using in vivo microdialysis in the human brain.

original: In the local presence into the LC of the α2adrenoceptor antagonist RS79948 1 μM systemic citalopram increased NA in the LC Emax = 157 ± 25 and PFC Emax = 175 ± 24

original: Local LC citalopram effect was abolished by LC presence of the 5HT3 receptor antagonist MDL72222 1 μM but not the 5HT12 receptor antagonist methiothepin 1 μM

original: Noradrenaline and phenylephrine alpha1adrenoceptor agonist each produced a concentrationdependent tonic contraction their pD2 values being 687008 and 610005 respectively
simplified: Noradrenaline and phenylephrine alpha1adrenoceptor agonists both produce a tonic contraction. The pD2 values for these drugs are 687008 and 610005.

original: Prazosin nonselective alpha1adrenoceptor antagonist silodosin selective alpha1Aadrenoceptor antagonist and BMY7378 8242methoxyphenyl1piperazinylethyl8azaspiro45decane79dione dihydrochloride selective alpha1Dadrenoceptor antagonist competitively antagonized the phenylephrine induced contraction pA2 values 860007 944006 and 575007 respectively
simplified: Prazosin selective alpha1adrenoceptor antagonist and BMY7378 8242methoxyphenyl1piperazinylethyl8azaspiro45decane79dione dihydrochloride selective alpha1Dadrenoceptor antagonist competitively antagonized the phenylephrine induced contraction pA2 values 860007 944006 and 575007 respectively.

original: alpha1Adrenoceptor antagonists were tested against the phenylephrine alpha1adrenoceptor agonistinduced contraction in isolated hamster ureteral preparations using a functional experimental approach
simplified: alpha1Adrenoceptor antagonists were tested against phenylephrine in isolated hamster ureteral preparations using a functional experimental approach and showed good results.

text: Despite the structural similarity between benzothiazepines and BDZs I1150A did not affect diazepam potency , but it did affect diltiazem potency .
original: Despite the structural similarity between benzothiazepines and BDZs mutation of an amino acid important for diltiazem potency I1150A did not affect diazepam potency
simplified: Despite the structural similarity between benzothiazepines and BDZs I1150A did not affect diazepam potency, but it did affect diltiazem potency.

text: Although LVGCC inhibition by BDZs occurred at concentrations that are possibly too high to be clinically relevant and is not likely to play a role in the upregulation of LVGCCs during longterm treatment pentobarbital and ethanol inhibited LVGCCs at clinically relevant concentrations
original: Although LVGCC inhibition by BDZs occurred at concentrations that are possibly too high to be clinically relevant and is not likely to play a role in the upregulation of LVGCCs during longterm treatment pentobarbital and ethanol inhibited LVGCCs at clinically relevant concentrations
simplified: Although BDZs inhibited LVGCCs at concentrations that are possibly too high to be clinically relevant, it is not likely to play a role in the upregulation of LVGCCs during long-term treatment, and pentobarbital and ethanol did not inhibit LVGCCs at clinically relevant levels.

text: BDZs and other positive GABAAR modulators including barbiturates ethanol and neurosteroids can also inhibit Ltype voltagegated calcium channels LVGCCs which could contribute to reduced neuronal excitability
original: BDZs and other positive GABAAR modulators including barbiturates ethanol and neurosteroids can also inhibit Ltype voltagegated calcium channels LVGCCs which could contribute to reduced neuronal excitability
simplified: BDZs and other positive GABAAR modulators including barbiturates and neurosteroids can also make calcium channels in the brain less active. This may reduce neuronal excitability.

text: Cav13 channels were less sensitive to pentobarbital inhibition than Cav12 channels similar to dihydropyridine DHP LVGCC antagonists
original: Cav13 channels were less sensitive to pentobarbital inhibition than Cav12 channels similar to dihydropyridine DHP LVGCC antagonists
simplified: Cav13 channels were less sensitive to pentobarbital than Cav12 channels. Dihydropyridine and LVGCC are similar to Cav12.

text: All GABAAR modulators induced a negative shift in the steadystate inactivation curve of Cav13 channels but only BDZs and pentobarbital induced a negative shift in Cav12 channel inactivation
original: All GABAAR modulators induced a negative shift in the steadystate inactivation curve of Cav13 channels but only BDZs and pentobarbital induced a negative shift in Cav12 channel inactivation
simplified: All GABAAR modulators changed the inactivation curve of the Cav13 channels in a negative way, but only BDZs and pentobarbital changed the inactivation curve in a negative way.

text: Thus we found that 5HHMF enhances heme oxygenase1 HO1 expression via nuclear factorerythroid 2related factor 2 Nrf2 activation
original: Thus we found that 5HHMF enhances heme oxygenase1 HO1 expression via nuclear factorerythroid 2related factor 2 Nrf2 activation
simplified: Thus we found that 5HHMF increases the expression of heme oxygenase1 HO1 by nuclear factorerythroid 2related factor 2.

text: In addition , cobalt protoporphyrin CoPP , a specific HO1 inducer , reduces the production of LPS .
original: In addition cobalt protoporphyrin CoPP a specific HO1 inducer predominantly suppressed LPSinduced NO production
simplified: In addition, cobalt protoporphyrin CoPP, a specific HO1 inducer, reduces the production of LPS.

text: 5Hydroxy367834hexamethoxyflavone inhibits nitric oxide production in lipopolysaccharidestimulated BV2 microglia via NFκB suppression and Nrf2 dependent heme oxygenase1 induction
original: 5Hydroxy367834hexamethoxyflavone inhibits nitric oxide production in lipopolysaccharidestimulated BV2 microglia via NFκB suppression and Nrf2 dependent heme oxygenase1 induction
simplified: 5Hydroxy367834hexamethoxyflavone inhibits nitric oxide production in lipopolysaccharidestimulated BV2 microglia by inhibiting heme oxygenase1 and NFκB.

text: Further 5HHMF increased specific DNAbinding activity of Nrf2 and transient knockdown with Nrf2 siRNA subsequently reversed 5HHMFinduced NO inhibition which was followed by suppression of HO1 activity
original: Further 5HHMF increased specific DNAbinding activity of Nrf2 and transient knockdown with Nrf2 siRNA subsequently reversed 5HHMFinduced NO inhibition which was followed by suppression of HO1 activity
simplified: Further 5HHMF increased specific DNAbinding activity of Nrf2 and transient knockdown with Nrf2 siRNA then reversed the effects of 5HHMF and HO1 inhibition.

text: Taken together our findings indicate that 5HHMF suppresses NO production through modulation of iNOS consequently suppressing NFκB activity and induction of Nrf2 dependent HO1 activity
original: Taken together our findings indicate that 5HHMF suppresses NO production through modulation of iNOS consequently suppressing NFκB activity and induction of Nrf2 dependent HO1 activity
simplified: Together, our findings indicate that 5HHMF suppresses NO production through modulation of iNOS. In addition, NFκB activity is reduced and HO1 activity increases.

text: In addition 5HHMF blocked LPSinduced phosphorylation of IκB resulting in suppression of the nuclear translocation of nuclear factorκB NFκB subunits namely p65 and p50 which are important molecules involved in the regulation of iNOS expression
original: In addition 5HHMF blocked LPSinduced phosphorylation of IκB resulting in suppression of the nuclear translocation of nuclear factorκB NFκB subunits namely p65 and p50 which are important molecules involved in the regulation of iNOS expression
simplified: In addition 5HHMF blocked LPSinduced phosphorylation of IκB resulting in suppression of the nuclear translocation of nuclear factorκB NFκB subunits, i.e. the expression of iNOS is reduced.

text: In this study we found that 5hydroxy367834hexamethoxyflavone 5HHMF from Hizikia fusiforme considerably inhibits lipopolysaccharide LPSstimulated NO production by suppressing the expression of inducible NO synthase iNOS in BV2 microglia
original: In this study we found that 5hydroxy367834hexamethoxyflavone 5HHMF from Hizikia fusiforme considerably inhibits lipopolysaccharide LPSstimulated NO production by suppressing the expression of inducible NO synthase iNOS in BV2 microglia
simplified: In this study we found that 5hydroxy367834hexamethoxyflavone 5HHMF from Hizikia fusiforme significantly inhibits the expression of iNOS in BV2 microglia by suppressing lipopolysaccharide LPSstimulated NO production.

text: Pyrrolidine dithiocarbamate PDTC a specific NFκB inhibitor along with 20S proteasome inhibitor PSI significantly inhibited LPSinduced iNOS expression which indirectly suggested that 5HHMF downregulated iNOS expression by suppressing NFκB activity
original: Pyrrolidine dithiocarbamate PDTC a specific NFκB inhibitor along with 20S proteasome inhibitor PSI significantly inhibited LPSinduced iNOS expression which indirectly suggested that 5HHMF downregulated iNOS expression by suppressing NFκB activity
simplified: Pyrrolidine dithiocarbamate, a specific NFκB inhibitor, and 20S proteasome inhibitor PSI significantly inhibited LPSinduced iNOS expression, suggesting that NFκB activity may be involved in the expression of iNOS.

text: In contrast zinc protoporphyrin ZnPP a specific HO1 inhibitor showed a partial suppressive effect of 5HHMF on LPSinduced NO production
original: In contrast zinc protoporphyrin ZnPP a specific HO1 inhibitor showed a partial suppressive effect of 5HHMF on LPSinduced NO production
simplified: Zinc protoporphyrin ZnPP is a specific HO1 inhibitor. It does not work very well, but it can slow down NO production.

original: Synthesis and antitumor activity of 134oxadiazole possessing 14benzodioxan moiety as a novel class of potent methionine aminopeptidase type II inhibitors
simplified: The synthesis and antitumor activity of 134oxadiazole with 14benzodioxan as a novel class of potent aminopeptidase type II inhibitors

original: One of the CB2 agonists Ncyclopentyl4ethoxy64methylpiperidin1yl135triazin2amine 19 logEC50=75 Emax=255 was selected for further development
simplified: Ncyclopentyl4ethoxy64methylpiperidin1yl135triazin2amine 19 logEC50=75 Emax=255 was selected for further development in 2006.

original: As far as we are aware the compounds 135triazine scaffold represents a new core structure for CB2 agonists
simplified: As far as we know, the 135triazine scaffold represents a new CB2 agonist core structure.

original: Discovery of novel cannabinoid receptor ligands by a virtual screening approach further development of 246trisubstituted 135triazines as CB2 agonists
simplified: Discovery of novel cannabinoid receptor ligands by a virtual screening approach Further development of CB2 receptor agonists is needed.

text: Purified PAOh1 SMO oxidizes both spermine Km=16 microM and N1acetylspermine Km=51 microM but does not oxidize spermidine
original: Purified PAOh1 SMO oxidizes both spermine Km=16 microM and N1acetylspermine Km=51 microM but does not oxidize spermidine
simplified: It can oxidize both spermine and n1acetylspermine. It does not oxidize spermidine though.

text: The purified human enzyme also does not oxidize eight representative antitumor polyamine analogues however specific oligamine analogues were found to be potent inhibitors of the oxidation of spermine by PAOh1 SMO

original: Therefore the objective of the present study was to investigate the effects of PLA2 inhibitors pbromophenacyl bromide BPB and arachidonyl trifluoromethyl ketone AACOCF3 on interleukin2 IL2 expression in murine primary splenocytes

original: To this end 158N murine oligodendrocytes were treated with 7KC or 7βOHC inducing an apoptotic mode of cell death characterized by condensationfragmentation of the nuclei dephosphorylation of Akt and GSK3 mitochondrial depolarization involving Mcl1 and caspase3 activation

original: EGF stimulated phosphorylation of ERK and Bad is blocked by pretreatment with U0126 a selective MAP kinase kinase MKK12 inhibitor
